entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
